verses.verse: <S%H835>Blessed<s%> is everyone who <S%H3373>fears<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> who <S%H1980>walks<s%> in his <S%H1870>ways.<s%>
For you will <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H3018>labor<s%> of your <S%H3709>hands.<s%> You will be <S%H835>happy,<s%> and it will be well with <S%H2896>you.<s%>

Your <S%H802>wife<s%> will be as a <S%H6509>fruitful<s%> <S%H1612>vine,<s%> in the innermost <S%H3411>parts<s%> of your <S%H1004>house;<s%> your <S%H1121>children<s%> like <S%H2132>olive<s%> <S%H8363>plants,<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> your <S%H7979>table.<s%>

May <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1288>bless<s%> you out of <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> and may you <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H2898>good<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> all the <S%H3117>days<s%> of your <S%H2416>life.<s%>
<S%H7200>Yes,<s%> may you see your <S%H1121>children<s%>'s <S%H1121>children.<s%> <S%H7965>Peace<s%> be upon <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
